Interface Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Moonshine.Builder
    Enclosing interface:
    Moonshine

    public static interface Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder addConfigDir(String path)
      Add read-only config directory.

      Adds configuration from given resource.

      Add read-only data directory.

      Adds custom Guice module.

      Adds configuration from given resource, if it exists.

      Add property resolver.

      Sets home directory for default file accessor.
      Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder shutdownHook(boolean shutdownHook)
      Enables or disables registering shutdown hook with Runtime.addShutdownHook(Thread).
      Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder skipDefaultConfigurationFiles()
      Skips default configuration files.

    • Method Detail

      • shutdownHook

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder shutdownHook(boolean shutdownHook)
        Enables or disables registering shutdown hook with Runtime.addShutdownHook(Thread).

      • homeDirectory

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder homeDirectory(String homeDirectory)
        Sets home directory for default file accessor.

      • skipDefaultConfigurationFiles

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder skipDefaultConfigurationFiles()
        Skips default configuration files.

        By default '/default-config.xml' classpath resource and ${configHome}/config.xml configuration files are read. This option ignores them.

      • addConfigurationFromResource

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder addConfigurationFromResource(String resource)
        Adds configuration from given resource.

      • addOptionalConfigurationFromResource

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder addOptionalConfigurationFromResource(String config)
        Adds configuration from given resource, if it exists.

        Ignores the resource, if it does not exist.

      • addModule

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder addModule(com.google.inject.Module module)
        Adds custom Guice module.

      • addConfigurationFromString

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder addConfigurationFromString(String string)
        Adds configuration from given string.

      • addPropertyResolver

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder addPropertyResolver(org.atteo.evo.filtering.PropertyResolver propertyResolver)
        Add property resolver.

      • addConfigDir

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder addConfigDir(String path)
        Add read-only config directory.

      • addDataDir

        Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder addDataDir(String path)
        Add read-only data directory.
